trans-unit.source: Represents a selection of content that an annotation is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: 주석이 고정되는 내용의 선택 영역을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor> is the object type of the returned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.ResolvedAnchor%2A> if you are using sticky notes and highlights in flow or fixed documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor> 반환 된 개체 형식이 <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo.ResolvedAnchor%2A> 스티커 메모 및 강조 표시가 흐름 또는 고정 된 문서를 사용 하는 경우.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 주석 창이 간단한 문서 판독기 응용 프로그램이 것이 좋습니다.

trans-unit.source: The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document.
trans-unit.target: 주석 창은 문서에 고정된 주석 목록의 텍스트를 표시하는 목록 상자일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 목록 상자에서 항목을 선택하면 응용 프로그램에서 해당 주석 개체에 고정된 문서의 단락을 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 주석 창으로 사용되는 목록 상자의 이벤트 처리기를 구현하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the end position of the text anchor.
The end position of the text anchor.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.BoundingEnd%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Gets the beginning position of the text anchor.
The beginning position of the text anchor.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.BoundingStart%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Consider a simple document reader application that has a comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 주석 창이 간단한 문서 판독기 응용 프로그램이 것이 좋습니다.

trans-unit.source: The comments pane might be a list box that displays the text from a list of annotations that are anchored to a document.
trans-unit.target: 주석 창은 문서에 고정된 주석 목록의 텍스트를 표시하는 목록 상자일 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the user selects an item in the list box, then the application brings into view the paragraph in the document that the corresponding annotation object is anchored to.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 목록 상자에서 항목을 선택하면 응용 프로그램에서 해당 주석 개체에 고정된 문서의 단락을 표시합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to implement the event handler of such a list box that serves as the comments pane.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 주석 창으로 사용되는 목록 상자의 이벤트 처리기를 구현하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to.
Returns a value that indicates whether the text anchor is equal to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 앵커가 지정된 개체와 같은지 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the two instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 두 인스턴스가 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.Equals%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Returns the hash code of the text anchor instance.
trans-unit.target: 텍스트 앵커 인스턴스의 해시 코드를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The hash code of the text anchor instance.
<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.TextAnchor.GetHashCode%2A> is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
